verses.verse: When you sit <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H3898><s%> with a ruler <S%H4910><s%>, consider <S%H995><s%> diligently <S%H995><s%> what is before you <S%H6440><s%>:
And put <S%H7760><s%> a knife <S%H7915><s%> to your throat <S%H3930><s%>, if you be a man given <S%H1167><s%> to appetite <S%H5315><s%>.
Be not desirous <S%H183><s%> of his dainties <S%H4303><s%>: for they are deceitful <S%H3577><s%> food <S%H3899><s%>.
Labor <S%H3021><s%> not to be rich <S%H6238><s%>: cease <S%H2308><s%> from your own wisdom <S%H998><s%>.

Will you set <S%H5774><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon that which is not <S%H6213><s%>? for riches certainly make <S%H6213><s%> themselves wings <S%H3671><s%>; they fly away <S%H5774><s%> as a eagle <S%H5404><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Eat <S%H3898><s%> you not the bread <S%H3899><s%> of him that has a evil <S%H7451><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%>, neither desire <S%H183><s%> you his dainty meats <S%H4303><s%>:
For as he thinks <S%H8176><s%> in his heart <S%H5315><s%>, so is he <S%H398><s%>: Eat and drink <S%H8354><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> he to you <S%H3820><s%>; but his heart is not with you.
The morsel <S%H6595><s%> which you have eaten <S%H398><s%> shall you vomit up <S%H6958><s%>, and lose <S%H7843><s%> your sweet <S%H5273><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.
Speak <S%H1696><s%> not in the ears <S%H241><s%> of a fool <S%H3684><s%>: for he will despise <S%H936><s%> the wisdom <S%H7922><s%> of your words <S%H4405><s%>.
Remove <S%H5253><s%> not the old <S%H5769><s%> landmark <S%H1366><s%>; and enter <S%H935><s%> not into the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>:
For their redeemer <S%H1350><s%> is mighty <S%H2389><s%>; he shall plead <S%H7378><s%> their cause with you <S%H7379><s%>.
Apply <S%H935><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> unto instruction <S%H4148><s%>, and your ears <S%H241><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
Withhold <S%H4513><s%> not correction <S%H4148><s%> from the child <S%H5288><s%>: for if you beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod <S%H7626><s%>, he shall not die <S%H4191><s%>.
You shall beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod <S%H7626><s%>, and shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from hell <S%H7585><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, if your heart <S%H3820><s%> be wise <S%H2449><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, even mine <S%H589><s%>.
Yes <S%H3629><s%>, my mind shall rejoice <S%H5937><s%>, when your lips <S%H8193><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> right things <S%H4339><s%>.
Let not your heart <S%H3820><s%> envy <S%H7065><s%> sinners <S%H2400><s%>: but be you in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all the day long <S%H3117><s%>.
For surely there is <S%H3426><s%> a end <S%H319><s%>; and your expectation <S%H8615><s%> shall not be cut off <S%H3772><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, my son, and be wise <S%H2449><s%>, and guide <S%H833><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>.
Be not among winebibbers <S%H3196><s%>; among riotous eaters <S%H2151><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>:
For the drunkard <S%H5433><s%> and the glutton <S%H2151><s%> shall come to poverty <S%H3423><s%>: and drowsiness <S%H5124><s%> shall clothe <S%H3847><s%> a man with rags <S%H7168><s%>.
Listen <S%H8085><s%> unto your father <S%H1><s%> that fathered <S%H3205><s%> you <S%H936><s%>, and despise not your mother <S%H517><s%> when she is old <S%H2204><s%>.
Buy <S%H7069><s%> the truth <S%H571><s%>, and sell <S%H4376><s%> it not <S%H2451><s%>; also wisdom, and instruction <S%H4148><s%>, and understanding <S%H998><s%>.

The father <S%H1><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall greatly <S%H1524><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%>: and he that fathers <S%H3205><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> child shall have joy of him <S%H8055><s%>.
Your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%> shall be glad <S%H8055><s%>, and she that bore <S%H3205><s%> you shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%>.
My son <S%H1121><s%>, give <S%H5414><s%> me your heart <S%H3820><s%>, and let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> observe <S%H7521><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For a whore <S%H2181><s%> is a deep <S%H6013><s%> ditch <S%H7745><s%>; and a strange woman <S%H5237><s%> is a narrow <S%H6862><s%> pit <S%H875><s%>.
She also lies in wait <S%H693><s%> as for a prey <S%H2863><s%>, and increases <S%H3254><s%> the transgressors <S%H898><s%> among men <S%H120><s%>.

Who has woe <S%H188><s%>? who has sorrow <S%H17><s%>? who has contentions <S%H4079><s%>? who has complaints <S%H7879><s%>? who has wounds <S%H6482><s%> without cause <S%H2600><s%>? who has redness <S%H2448><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%>?
They that stay long <S%H309><s%> at the wine <S%H3196><s%>; they that go <S%H935><s%> to seek <S%H2713><s%> mixed wine <S%H4469><s%>.

Look <S%H7200><s%> not you upon the wine <S%H3196><s%> when it is red <S%H119><s%>, when it gives <S%H5414><s%> his colour <S%H5869><s%> in the cup <S%H3563><s%>, when it goes <S%H1980><s%> down smoothly <S%H4339><s%>.
At the last <S%H319><s%> it bites <S%H5391><s%> like a serpent <S%H5175><s%>, and stings <S%H6567><s%> like a adder <S%H6848><s%>.
Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> strange women <S%H2114><s%>, and your heart <S%H3820><s%> shall utter <S%H1696><s%> perverse things <S%H8419><s%>.
Yes <S%H7901><s%>, you shall be as he that lies down in the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, or as he that lies <S%H7901><s%> upon the top <S%H7218><s%> of a mast <S%H2260><s%>.

They have stricken <S%H5221><s%> me <S%H2470><s%>, shall you say, and I was not sick; they have beaten <S%H1986><s%> me <S%H3045><s%>, and I felt it not <S%H6974><s%>: when shall I awake? I will seek <S%H1245><s%> it yet again <S%H3254><s%>.
